definition: surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: That may be the dream but, as Chan notes, the reality is often different.
sentences.chinese: 這可能是個夢想，但據陳說，現實情況通常都很困難。

sentences.english: I poured out my complaint before him; I shewed before him my trouble.
sentences.chinese: 我在他面前吐露我的苦情，陳說我的患難。

sentences.english: Chen said his favorite football, Zhang Qiang laugh.
sentences.chinese: 陳說他最愛足球，張強笑了。

sentences.english: "I should punch you in the face " Mr. Chen said.
Chen said his most lonely, Dongzu just smiled.
sentences.chinese: 陳說他最寂寞，董祖剛笑了。

sentences.english: Suppose the musician is guilty. Are any of the statement false?
sentences.chinese: 假定音樂家是監犯，那麼其他陳說中會有謊言嗎？

sentences.english: "He said he would give us his last penny, " Chen said.
sentences.chinese: “他說他可以把他的所有錢都賠給我們，”老陳說。

sentences.english: Arnheim thinks painting is a wordless statements.
sentences.chinese: 阿恩海姆以爲繪畫是一種無言的陳說。

sentences.english: Suppose the sever is guilty. Are any of the statement false?
sentences.chinese: 假定效勞員是監犯，那麼其他陳說中會有謊言嗎？

sentences.english: “At that point, it was still mostly bicycles and people walking, ” Mr. Chan said.
sentences.chinese: 老陳說，“那個時侯，交通主要還是自行車和步行。

sentences.english: I pour out my complaint before him; before him I tell my trouble.
sentences.chinese: 我在他面前吐露我的苦情，陳說我的患難。

sentences.english: "He said he would give us his last penny," Chen said.
sentences.chinese: “他說他可以把他的所有錢都賠給我們，”老陳說。

sentences.english: At the station the statesman hesitates to state the status of the statue.
sentences.chinese: 在車站代發政治論文家不願陳說雕像的狀況。
